divs: Sighting Detailsjust got home about 8 or9 oclock.as my wife and her mother and my self, i noticed a group off 5 lights .huge lights. the houston airport jets were taking off and they had to turn quickly, to avoid. this things lights that the jet marker lights,where about the size of a pencil,the lights of the ufo where like the size of the full moon. huge there were5 lights moving very slow as it moved away about 1 hour the lights were in no hurry .also it was about half the horizon .my wife and mother in law .were amazed at the size.my wife just retired from army .she can tell distance and size prettygood. she said just one of lights had to be 900 feet.at least,camparing the ufo lights and the commercial jets taking off .lasted about one hour.
